column4: Hi all. Recently I've had some trouble keeping my WindowPickerApplet displayed. I've tried using Emerald, and have also added window manager (gnome-wm) to my startup, and still it hides itself on me... 'metacity --replace' will make it reappear but it usually disappears soon there after... any suggestions?
do you have compiz setting manager installed¿¿
ten better remove that window applet you use, open compiz settings and go to the window decoration plugin
and just restart your session, that should work
